content: The Nvidia RTX 3080 is a powerful GPU and offers big performance gains. This card delivers great performance.

It performs 15-30% better than the RTX 3080 in most games, even with CPU bottlenecks at 4K.

The RTX 3080 is a pretty good graphics card, I recommend it.
